title: Fashionista
body:
<<if !visited("Fashionista.GivePost")>>
    Can't you see I'm busy?
    -> I just wanted to get the mail<<if visited("Postperson.AskForPost")>>
        [[Fashionista.GivePost]]
<<else>>
    Do you think my pitch was already read?
    Will they like it?
    Gosh I'm so exited for this!!
<<endif>>

title: Fashionista.GivePost
body:
Oh yes!
I just didn't expect you to get collect the mail.
I wrote a pitch for a fashion magazine.
Do you think I'll be accepted?
